all_text_timv: Franck, César, 1822-1890. Piano music. Selections Piano transcriptions [electronic resource] / César Franck. [Hong Kong] : Naxos Music Library, [2004] 001748 001210 001109 003216 performed music prm rdacontent computer c rdamedia online resource cr rdacarrier Streaming audio. Mode of access: World Wide Web. System requirements: MS Windows 98SE, or 2000, or XP; MS Internet Explorer 6.0, Mozilla 1.7.1, FireFox 1PR, Netscape 7.1, or Opera 7.53; and Media Player 9 or 10. System requirements: Macintosh: Mac OS X 10.2.8 or 10.3.5; MS Internet Explorer 5.2, Mozilla 1.7, Netscape 7.1, Opera 7.53, or Safari 1.0; Media Player 9.0. Or, Mac OS 8.6 / 9.0; MS Internet Explorer 5.1; Windows Media Player 7.1. The 1st work is not a transcription; the 2nd and 3rd works originally for organ. Transcriptions by Harold Bauer and Alfred Cortot. Title from image of compact disc cover on Web page (viewed Dec. 15, 2004). Alexander Paley, piano. Recorded at Fisher Hall, Santa Rosa, Calif., July 1-4, 1994. Includes program notes. Also available as compact disc. Prelude, chorale and fugue (M. 21) (17:48) -- Prelude, fugue and variation, op. 18 (12:10) -- Pastorale, op. 19 (11:09) -- Sonata for violin and piano (M. 8) (32:16). Canons, fugues, etc. (Piano) Piano music, Arranged. Paley, Alexander, 1956- performer. Bauer, Harold, 1873-1951, arranger. Cortot, Alfred, 1877-1962, arranger. Franck, César, 1822-1890. Prélude, choral et fugue, piano. Franck, César, 1822-1890. Pieces, organ (1862). Prélude, fugue et variation; arranged. Franck, César, 1822-1890. Pieces, organ (1862). Pastorale; arranged. Franck, César, 1822-1890. Sonatas, violin, piano, A major; arranged.
